name: Last Man Standing (itch) (stickzman)
description:
A game for the Beginner's Circle Jam 4.

You've entered into the Wipeout-style game show where you must body slam everyone else off a suspended platform in order to become the Last Man Standing!

However, you're a bit on the small side and it looks like all the other contestants have teamed up against you. Use your reflexes to dodge their attacks and body slam them into next week!

Controls:

Move with W, A, S, D.

 Aim with Mouse. 

Hold Left Mouse Button to charge your body slam, release lunge forward!
